channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Printer GM265DN (production date June 2022 and before)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Printer GM265DN (production date June 2022 and before)

item.title: CVE-2022-34887|2024-08-03T09:22:10.725Z -- lenovo -- printer%20gm265dn%20%28production%20date%20june%202022%20and%20before%29
item.description: Standard users can directly operate and set printer configuration information , such as IP, in some Lenovo Printers without having to authenticate with the administrator password.

item.title: CVE-2022-3429|2024-08-03T01:07:06.548Z -- lenovo -- printer%20gm265dn%20%28production%20date%20june%202022%20and%20before%29
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability was found in the firmware used in Lenovo printers, where users send illegal or malformed strings to an open port, triggering a denial of service that causes a display error and prevents the printer from functioning properly.

item.title: CVE-2022-34886|2024-08-03T09:22:10.644Z -- lenovo -- printer%20gm265dn%20%28production%20date%20june%202022%20and%20before%29
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability was found in the firmware used in some Lenovo printers, which can be caused by a remote user pushing an illegal string to the server-side interface via a script, resulting in a stack overflow.
